resources.string: The account is disabled. Unable to access the service server.
Connect to FlashAir manually from Settings
Do you want to continue recording?
This dictation name already exist in the list
Please wait while compress your recording or press the home button to compress in the background
Do you want to continue insertion?
Do you want to continue overwrite?
Cannot record anymore since it reached maximum recording.
Since recording file size is large, it will be sent seperating to several files.
Please disconnect the active call and proceed
There is not enough memory or disk space to complete the operation
Since selected file size exceeds email attachment limit, it will be sent as multiple emails.
FlashAir™ is a trademark or registered trademark of TOSHIBA CORPORATION.
Please activate your account.Tap the [Check Server Connection] to activate in the Server Options.
Cannot establish connection with FlashAir card
An error occured while receving the data. please check the FlashAir connection
Cannot send the following file(s) since file size is too large .Please use \'FTP\' option to send large files.
Please switch back to valid Wi-fi connection if you are connected to the FlashAir card
Wi-Fi is not accessible.Please make sure that Wi-Fi is enabled in the settings.
FlashAir connection is required for this function.Connect to FlashAir card using Settings>Wi-Fi>Choose a network
Establish a Wi-Fi Connection with FlashAir card and Tap "Done"
Set this FlashAir card in Settings
Sending dictation file(s). Do not press Home/Sleep button until the transmission is completed.
Your profile is being used by another device. Select [Yes] to use your profile to activate this device.\nNOTE: The other device will be deactivated once you select [Yes].
This device is deactivated by administrator.Tap the [Check Server Connection] to activate in the Server options.
This device is already activated by another E-mail address. Do you want to change the E-mail address?
Can\'t connect to server.The ODP connection failed.
Activation failed due to incorrect Author ID or Recipients entries.
The license expired. Unable to access the service server.
The version of the app is old. Unable to access the service server. Update the app.
Activation failed due to a shortage of available licenses. Please order an additional license.
Select the \"Sending Failed\" items in the Outbox tab and tap the [Send] icon to resend them.
Please enter a valid dictation name.
You haven\'t saved your changes.Click Discard below to proceed without saving or Cancel to return to recording.
Are you sure you want to delete # recordings in Pending? This cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete all recordings in Pending? This cannot be undone and you will lose all recordings in Pending.
What do you want to do for sent dictation?
This service sends dictation files via E-mail and FTP. For prevent information leakage,we recommend you to make demands your administrator to encrypt dictation files strongly.
Are you sure you want to Restore # recordings?
Are you sure you want to send all recordings?
Are you sure you want to send # recordings?
You have changed server information. Do you want to authenticate with server?
Connection to the server failed. Please make sure Server URL, User, Password and E-mail are correct.
Please restart application for language settings to take effect
The ODP connection failed.Please enter a valid ODP URL.
This worktype already exists in the list
FlashAir is a trademark or registered trademark of TOSHIBA CORPORATION
Please make sure Personal name,AuthorID,Password and EmailID are correct
Unable to start recording. Another recorder application running
Wi-Fi is a registered mark of the Wi-Fi Alliance.
Please enter an e-mail address for your Account.This e-mail address can also be used for the first Author using the Dictation App.
Please set an ID for the Author. Dictation files will be tagged with the Author ID. The ID must be between 1 and 16 letters, numbers or underbars.
Please create your Account ID. The ID must be less than 256 letters.
Please set a password for your Account. The password must be between 8 and 24 characters, containing at least one letter, one number, and one special character.
[For users that have a existing Company Account]
Enter new recipient\'s E-mail address, tap the (+) icon to add. Please select this user from the Recipients list, to send dictations to this user.
Please enter the E-mail Address for the Author who will use the Dictation App.
AUTHOR\'S E-MAIL ADDRESS AND AUTHOR ID (INITIALS)

Thank you for sigining up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service.
The trial licenses is valid for xx days.

During the trial,you can add up to 100 Authors to be managed under the Dictation Delivery Service.Authors can be added from the Olympus Dictation Portal.Login from the following URL.

If you wish to continue using the Olympus Dictation Service, please Login to Olympus Dictation Portal

Licenses can be purchased under the [Account] Tab.

To purchase the license please enter the following information.
\u2022 Country where you are based.
\u2022 The dealer you wish to purchase the lisence from.
\u2022 Number of lisences.

Olympus Dictation Portal URL
[-https://www.dictation-portal.com/-]

If you already have a Company Account, please tap the button below to complete your registration. 

Please confirm the following information with your administrator and enter the information in the next screen 
• Account ID 
• Password for ODSS 
• Your E-mail Address
Yes, I agree to the Terms of Use
Please enter the e-mail destination for the dictation files from Author 1.If you with to add multiple destinations,please setup from olympus Dictation Portal after your complete the initial setup.
Your file had been sent to the Dictation Delivery Server but could not be sent anywhere since the destination has not been set.
This device is already activaed by another e-mail address
E-mail not available for selected person
Author\'s e-mail address and Author ID (Initials)

In order to send Dictations from the App, you are required to sign up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service (ODDS).\\nCurrently, your Dictations are sent to an external server managed by ODDS. By signing up for an ODDS trial, your Dictations will then be transferred from the external server to a destination that you designate.\\nAfter the trial, you are required to purchase an annual license in order to continue using the ODDS.\\n
Tap below to sign up for the trial now.

Thank you for using the Olympus Dictation App. 

From Olympus Dictation Version 2.0.0, function to send Dictation by email has been merged to Olympus Dictation Delivery Service(ODDS).Your Dictations will be sent via an external server managed by ODDS.

 Please sign up to use the ODDS as a trial,you are required to purchase an annual license in order to continue using the ODDS. 

Click the following and sign up for the trial now.

Thank you for using the Olympus Dictation App. \n\nBeginning with Olympus Dictation Version 2.0.0, the ability to send Dictations by E-mail has been migrated to Olympus Dictation Delivery Service (ODDS). Your Dictations will be sent via an external server managed by ODDS.

In order to send Dictations from the App, you are required to sign up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service (ODDS). 

Currently, your Dictations are sent to an external server managed by ODDS. By signing up for an ODDS trial, your Dictations will then be transferred from the external server to a destination that you designate. 

After the trial, you are required to purchase an annual license in order to continue using the ODDS.

 Tap below to sign up for the trial now.
"Please tap the button below if this is your first time to register for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service. "

Click here to " + "link " + "created in the Java source code using HTML.
To prevent the notification sound from being recorded, tap "PERMISSION", then allow Dictation to access Do not disturb, and try again.
Please enter your company name or your personal name
Please set a password for the Dictation Delivery Service. \nThe password must be more than 8 or less than 25 letters,number and symbols.
To execute this action, tap "SETTINGS", go to App info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:

Software Privacy Policy for Olympus Dictation


1. RECORD_AUDIO
This is used for the recording function in the App.

2. READ_PHONE_STATE
By reading this state will detect incoming and outgoing calls that occurred during recording and stop the App to record.

3. READ_CONTACTS
This is being used to select the destination of the e-mails attached with voice files.
Account Registration for Dictation Delivery Service
The Dictation file you sent is currently stored on your device. Once you have activated your ODDS trial, please resend the Dictation.
Converting file format, and then transfer it to the server.
